name: Google Sheets
purpose: Cloud-based spreadsheet platform for data storage, organization, collaboration, and analysis
description: Google Sheets is a cloud-based spreadsheet application that allows users to create, edit, and share spreadsheets online. Part of Google Workspace, it provides real-time collaboration, API integration capabilities, formulas, charts, and pivot tables. Widely used across all departments for data storage, analysis, reporting, and as an integration destination for automation tools.
cost_structure: Freemium (Free with Google account, paid Google Workspace plans for business features)

actual_remote_helpers_usage.primary_use: Universal Data Storage and Collaboration Platform
use_cases: analyze data with formulas and pivot tables
receive exported data from web scraping

strengths: Universal access - works on any device with internet
limitations: Performance degrades with very large datasets (100k+ rows)
Less powerful than Excel for complex analysis
Cell and sheet limits on free accounts

video_source.video_title: This AI Agent Will DO Your Work For You! (Browse AI)
video_source.context: Export destination for Browse AI scraped data

key_features.description: Multiple users can edit the same spreadsheet simultaneously
key_features.use_case: Team collaboration on data analysis and reporting

key_features.description: Programmatic access to create, read, update spreadsheets
key_features.use_case: Automate data import/export from external tools

key_features.description: Extensive library of built-in formulas for calculations and data manipulation
Create charts, graphs, and visual representations of data
Import CSV, Excel files; export to multiple formats
key_features.use_case: Data migration and sharing across platforms

key_features.description: Automatic version control with ability to restore previous versions
key_features.use_case: Track changes and recover from errors

business_value: Universal platform accessible across all devices
Zero-cost solution for most business needs

typical_usage_in_video_022.workflow_position: Final step of web scraping pipeline
typical_usage_in_video_022.data_format: Structured rows and columns from scraped lists
typical_usage_in_video_022.example: 50 AI tools exported to Google Sheets with Name, Description, Link columns

notes: Referenced in Video_022 as export destination for Browse AI
